gps

Class LocationGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gps.LocationGenerator

  • public class LocationGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class produce current or custom Location. Adapted from https://github.com/baoliangwang/CurrentLocation
    Author:
    xuping

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocationGenerator(LocationManager lm)
      Construct a Location_Generator with a LocationManager and create a new Location Listener.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentLocation

        public Location getCurrentLocation()
        Returns:
        the current Location, or raise Exception if GPS is not running.

      • getCustomLocation

        public Location getCustomLocation(double latitude,
                         double longitude)
        Parameters:
        latitude - custom latitude in double.
        longitude - custom longitude in double.
        Returns:
        the custom set location by given latitude, and the given longitude.
